tool.name: SAGA.sim_hydrology.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayROUGHNESS False isArrayGAUGES False output_data_FLOW $output_data_FLOW output_data_GAUGES_FLOW $output_data_GAUGES_FLOW name SAGA.sim_hydrology.1 DEM $DEM ROUGHNESS $ROUGHNESS ROUGHNESS_DEFAULT $ROUGHNESS_DEFAULT GAUGES $GAUGES TIME_SPAN $TIME_SPAN TIME_STEP $TIME_STEP TIME_UPDATE $TIME_UPDATE MAXITER $MAXITER EPSILON $EPSILON ROUTING $ROUTING DYNAMIC $DYNAMIC FLOW_RESET $FLOW_RESET P_RATE $P_RATE P_DISTRIB $P_DISTRIB P_THRESHOLD $P_THRESHOLD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.outputType_FLOW transmissionMode_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.transmissionMode_FLOW outputType_GAUGES_FLOW $OutputSection_GAUGES_FLOW.outputType_GAUGES_FLOW transmissionMode_GAUGES_FLOW $OutputSection_GAUGES_FLOW.transmissionMode_GAUGES_FLOW

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: ROUGHNESS
param.label: Manning Roughness
param.help: Manning Roughness The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi

param.name: ROUGHNESS_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: GAUGES
param.label: Gauges
param.help: Gauges The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: TIME_UPDATE
param.label: Map Update Frequency [min]
param.help: If zero each simulation time step will update the flow map.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FLOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_FLOW
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_GAUGES_FLOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_GAUGES_FLOW
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This is a simple tool that simulates overland flow with a kinematic wave approach. It is not designed for operational usage. Rather it should give an idea about some principles of dynamic simulation techniques and thus it might become a starting point for more sophisticated and applicable simulation tools.
